objectives.en: The aim of this course is to discuss the processes characteristic to the current society saturated by media and technology (mediatisation, digitalisation, rise of networks and globalisation) and the accompanying rise of new publics. Additionally, the concept of public sphere and its change in the context of the development of technology will be discussed, focusing on the phenomena specific to the networked and fragmented publics, like online-activism, change of perceived privacy norms, etc
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on arutleda tänapäevast meediast ja tehnoloogiast küllastunud ühiskonda iseloomustavate protsesside - mediatiseerumine, digitaliseerimine, võrgustumine, globaliseerumine -  ja nendega kaasnevate uute avalikkuste tekke üle. Kursus käsitleb avalikkuse mõistet ja selle muutumist tehnoloogia arengu käigus. Kursuse käigus analüüsitakse võrgustunud ning killustunud avalikkustes alguse saanud nähtusi, nagu online-aktivism, tajutavate privaatsusnormide muutumine jne.

learning_outcomes.en: The student who has passed this course will:
1) be familiar with the concepts and theories characterising the current media society;
2) able to recognise the and theoretically conceptualise one's own action in communicative situations;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) oma kommunikatsioonitegevuses ära tunda ja teoreetiliselt mõtestada oma igapäevaseid kommunikatsioonisituatsioone;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) be able to compare different theoretical approaches to public sphere and publics and to point out their differences;
learning_outcomes.et: 3) võrrelda erinevaid teoreetilisi avaliku sfääri ja avalikkuste käsitlusi ning osundada nende omavahelistele erinevustele;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) be able to criticise/review different networked publics in contemporary society;
learning_outcomes.et: 4) arvustada erinevaid kaasaegses ühiskonnas tekkinud võrgustunud avalikkusi;

learning_outcomes.en: 5) be able to evaluate the statements about privacy and public spheres proposed in public;
learning_outcomes.et: 5) hinnata avalikus diskursuses esitatud väiteid privaatsuse ja avalike sfääride teemadel;

learning_outcomes.en: 6) be able to analyse the relationships between privacy, digital technologies and public spheres.
learning_outcomes.et: 6) analüüsida privaatsuse, digitaalsete tehnoloogiate ning avalikkuste omavahelisi suhteid.

independent_work.et:
Reaction papers to readings for each class (lenght: 1 page, including three most important ideas from the text and three questions) - 6x5p
To be submitted on the previous day by 12 noon.
Final assignment :Group work (written analysis and oral presentation): empirical mapping and an analysis of one self-selected new online "public." The analysis consists of a theoretical framework posed on the topic of "new online publics" and an empirical field work mapping the phenomenon.
